title: JCO and I - phrase "to that other"

content.prompt: In Paragraph 1, the phrase "to that other" primarily does which of the following?

choices.label: It explains why the statement "nothing ever happens" is true.
It identifies the one to whom "nothing ever happens."
It indicates uncertainty by inverting normal word order.
It suggests that what appears to be a fact is not.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how the organization of a text creates unity and coherence and reflects a line of reasoning.
